title: Friday night programming jam - Hanging out on the forums!
body:
Hi everyone :) 

How are you and what are you up to tonight?

replies.body: Working on some posts~ this next ones about blue buff and who it belongs to under which circumstances. :)
I'm doing fine. Found out about a new J4 Trick in one for all, it was a cool discovery.
watching a halo movie? Didint realize they actually had made a movie. its... ok. better than most based on videogame movies i have seen.

IDK if you work on the HUD, but please look at this: http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?p=38381305

I only recently started checking the Beta forums, but the link I posted is a very old (remake of one that is older by a year) thread and I haven't remade it on the Beta forums yet.
 
As far as what I'm up to tonight, I'm overdue for sleep lol. I leave on the train later to go back to my campustown to begin work on a personal project (CS/game design related! I'll probably post an @Riot thread at some point to ask stuff lol :D)

Composing my vision of the Summoner's Rift background music as an exercise. Currently deciding whether the sketch I've written is appropriate for the pre-turret-knockdown stage or post-turret-knockdown & pre-exposed-inhibitor stage.

When your programming, please check out this thread and consider it please. 

http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=4563026
Why would you post this now that I'm going to bed? =(

Hey, nothing much tonight. Just playing a bit of XCOM Enemy Within for a change of pace. Classic difficulty is tough as I keep losing troops way more than I would like. Other than that drinking some grape flavored soda and watching some twitch streams.
Whats your favorite thing about lol and working for Riot

Just put up my first piece of League Fan Fiction. Been working on it it the past few days, and I'm honestly a bit scared. Not that people won't like it, but that it'll pass unnoticed. Oh well, Hi-Diddle-Dee-Dee, a writer's life for me.

Might play a game or two to cool off. :P
